basic.description: This course introduces the sociological literature on sexuality. Drawing from social psychological theories and life course perspective, the following questions are pursued: (1) How do sexual behaviors change across life stages?; (2) What influences and is influenced by sexuality in each life stage?; and (3) How does sexuality influence life trajectories? The course pays special attention to social inequality issues.
basic.subject: SYP
basic.title: Sexuality Over the Life Course
